languageToPublish: Please select in which language(s) you wish to submit this record:
additionalInformation: Additional information for the country profile
relevantInformationInfo: Please use this field to provide any relevant additional information that will appear as part of your country profile.
notesInfo: The “Notes” field is for personal reference and can be seen only when the record is being edited. It will be hidden once the record is published. This field is not meant to be used for confidential information.
countryProfileInfo: Only one country profile record is allowed in the Biosafety Clearing-House for each government. The country profile for your government already exists in the Biosafety Clearing-House. You will be redirected to that record in
